feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 09 at 8:31AM AKDT until September 09 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY NEAR GLENNALLEN... * WHAT...Visibility to a quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Glennallen and low lying areas along the Copper River. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley, mainly higher elevations along the Dalton Highway. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM AKDT Sunday.

entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR SOUTHERN FLOYD AND WEST CENTRAL BARTOW COUNTIES IS CANCELLED... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer poses an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However, gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with these thunderstorms.
